meanings.definition: A type of virus that causes the common cold.
meanings.sent1: Rhinoviruses spread easily during the cold season.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend rest and fluids to fight rhinoviruses.
meanings.sent3: The rhinoviruses seemed to have a party in my nose!
meanings.sent4: The rhinoviruses invaded my body like tiny, sneezy pirates.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the sneaky rhinoviruses that made me sniffle all week.

meanings.sent1: Last winter, many rhinoviruses were going around the school.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the test results showed rhinoviruses.
meanings.sent3: The rhinoviruses in the lab were having a meeting about infecting people.
meanings.sent4: The rhinoviruses in the air were like a cloud of tiny troublemakers.
meanings.sent5: The rhinoviruses in my system were like unwelcome guests overstaying their welcome.
